Hi, my name is Roma and I'm from Kremenchuk, Ukraine. I have been playing board games for over 10 years. The idea for this app came to me while playing Star Realms (which has terrible tokens).

I'm not a developer and I'm working on this app in my spare time. Each of your feedback, your email or donation makes me a little bit happier. If you have something to share, want help with translation, or just share what you're counting, don't hesitate to contact me.

Despite the war in my country, I decided to keep this app free and without ads at all. If you would like to support an indie developer (me), please consider donating in-app.

Thank you!

Calling all language wizards and animal enthusiasts! Let\'s spice up our beloved app with translations and hilarious animal aliases.\n\nJoin the party and be as cool as people who already lent their awesomeness:
Tap on the \"+\" button in the top right corner to add a new counter
You can edit these values in the settings
